list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update .idea configuration to use Poetry environment
- Updated `.idea/misc.xml` and `.idea/PyGeneratePrevisibines.iml` to reference the Poetry Python SDK. - Adjusted `.idea/workspace.xml` settings to align with project configuration and IDE preferences.
These changes improve project consistency and development environment setup.

task.summary:
Remove outdated .idea settings, enhance validations, and add detailed docstrings
- Deleted unnecessary .idea directory files, including redundant `.gitignore` entries and `workspace.xml`. - Refactored `Settings`, `PrevisBuilder`, and related classes to include comprehensive docstrings, detailing method functionality and parameter definitions for improved code clarity. - Converted multiple instance methods to static methods for better design consistency. - Enhanced validation logic for plugin names, directories, and tool paths to ensure stricter error-checking and reporting.
These updates improve project cleanliness, readability, and robustness.

Update .idea configuration to use Poetry environment
- Updated `.idea/misc.xml` and `.idea/PyGeneratePrevisibines.iml` to reference the Poetry Python SDK. - Adjusted `.idea/workspace.xml` settings to align with project configuration and IDE preferences.
These changes improve project consistency and development environment setup.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove unused `.idea` files, enhance docstrings, and refactor static methods
- Deleted unnecessary `.idea` project files to declutter the repository. - Added comprehensive docstrings to improve method and class documentation. - Refactored several methods in `PrevisBuilder` to be static where instance access was unnecessary. - Improved validation methods in the `Settings` and `CKPEConfig` classes with updated error handling and enhanced clarity through detailed comments.
These updates enhance maintainability, repository cleanliness, and code clarity.

Remove outdated .idea settings, enhance validations, and add detailed docstrings
- Deleted unnecessary .idea directory files, including redundant `.gitignore` entries and `workspace.xml`. - Refactored `Settings`, `PrevisBuilder`, and related classes to include comprehensive docstrings, detailing method functionality and parameter definitions for improved code clarity. - Converted multiple instance methods to static methods for better design consistency. - Enhanced validation logic for plugin names, directories, and tool paths to ensure stricter error-checking and reporting.
These updates improve project cleanliness, readability, and robustness.

These changes improve project consistency and development environment setup.
